sentences.en: A strategy can be advantageous when rare and disadvantageous when common.
sentences.cn: 如果只有少数人采用某策略,得益自然就高,而一旦普遍采用,得益自然就低.

sentences.en: Chen Jing: Some advantage also have the disadvantageous aspect.
sentences.cn: 陈静: 有好处也有不利的方面.

sentences.en: Extraversion is advantageous to mental health, and neuroticism is disadvantageous to.
sentences.cn: 外向型性格有利于老年人心理健康, 神经质性格不利于老年人心理健康.

sentences.en: However, these solutions are disadvantageous in cost and complexity of technology.
sentences.cn: 但是, 这些方案存在成本高、技术复杂等缺点.

sentences.en: HSP 70 is the suitable marker to reflect the disadvantageous ecological stress.
sentences.cn: 热应激蛋白HSP70是反映环境因子胁迫引发的不利生态效应的合适因子.

sentences.en: Meantime, they were disadvantageous in Britain - China trade undertaking huge trade deficit.
sentences.cn: 同时在与中国发生的贸易关系中处于不利地位,承受着巨额贸易逆差.

sentences.en: On the contrary, disadvantageous companies will face growing difficulties and contradictions.
sentences.cn: 相反, 处于劣势公司的困难和矛盾更加突出.

sentences.en: The deal will not be disadvantageous to your company.
sentences.cn: 这项交易不会对你公司不利。

sentences.en: The high new technique has advantageous and disadvantageous to us.
sentences.cn: 高新技术对我们既有利又有弊.

sentences.en: The higher alkalization degree, the more disadvantageous crops seed and growth.
sentences.cn: 碱化度越高, 越不利于作物的出苗和生长.

sentences.en: The most disadvantageous peace is better than the most just war.
sentences.cn: 最糟糕的和平也好过最合理的战争.

sentences.en: The sale of part of the company could be disadvantageous to investors.
sentences.cn: 对公司局部的出售可能对投资人不利。

sentences.en: This dissertation emphasizes the advantageous and disadvantageous elements in establishing a regime.
sentences.cn: 文章重点分析了对我国建立与国际统一的赔偿机制的有利与不利因素.

sentences.en: This paper analyzes the disadvantageous effect of the widening of income differences.
sentences.cn: 分析了收入差距扩大的不利影响.

sentences.en: What is disadvantageous to John may be advantageous to Henry.
sentences.cn: 对约翰不利的事情也许对亨利有利.

sentences.en: You have taken up disadvantageous position, this has been people's nature.
sentences.cn: 你占了下风, 这是人的本性.

words.tran_cn: 贫困的；处于不利地位的；社会地位低下的
使处于不利地位（disadvantage的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: unfavourable and likely to cause problems for you
